headline: Here’s Why Mettler Toledo’s (MTD) Stock Declined in Q2
summary: Mar Vista Investment Partners, LLC, an investment management company, released its “Mar Vista U.S. Quality Premier Strategy” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The first half of 2025 concluded on a remarkable note, with U.S. stocks bouncing back from earlier volatility to reach new record highs. The S&P […]
